result.title: Code Monk : Dynamic Programming
result.content:
After its first success, CodeMonk is back with yet another set of challenging problems to test your in depth understanding. This week Dynamic Programming for all of you guys.

Problems of various difficulty level in contest are related to Dynamic Programming ;). Main character of all problems is a little fun loving girl named, Vaishu.

Contest is on April 06, 2015 09:00 IST and will be live for 3 hours. Link to the contest: Code Monk: Dynamic Programming

Problem setter of the contest is: gorv and tester and editorialist is: Xsquare. We have brought some fun loving problems to make it far more interesting and exciting for all you guys :)

Detailed editorials will be provided to each problem by the end of the contest. So say tuned !!

Also, special thanks to Prateek Garg (prat33k) for his support throughout the preparation of the contest. It wouldn't have been possible without you guys. :)

So Register for the contest, show your love for Dynamic Programming.

Good luck to everyone, and have fun! :)

Don't Forget : Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it :D

Reminder : Hope you are all set for contest :). It starts in an hour now. If there are any feedbacks you want to share after the contest, you are welcomed.

Contest is over. Congratulations to winners. Top three are :
1. mahbubcseju
2. mauricio11
3. sahed2
